DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of electrically heated humidifier on the body temperature during shoulder arthroscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Changes of Body Temperature During Shoulder Arthroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: On the control group, use only routine anesthetic respiratory circuit for mechanical ventilation On the comparative group, use electrically heated humidifier for mechanical ventilation And compared the changes of body temperature durgin shoulder artheroscopy.
DOC.criteria: American society of anesthesiologist physical status 1 or 2 2060 years old body mass index over 30 kg/m2 peripheral vascular disease uncontrolled cardiovascular disease
